name: Dubbing Time
description:
Dubbing Time is a game in which characters from 8 different parts are voiced and we wrote the scenario consisting of 8 parts. There are 4 themes in the game: Western, Heist, Gang, Cyber. And each theme has 2 parts. The stories of these episodes are linked.

Gameplay

Read the story of the episode first. Read the personal traits of the characters. Understand the character. Then write down your dialogs. Finish dubbing and watch your movies.
